bug.author: Talish-wiz
bug.summary: while deploying streamlit app on heroku "Streamlit failed to hash an object of type <class 'code'>.,"
bug.description: Deployed ARIMA model on streamlit using heroku it saying "Streamlit failed to hash an object of type <class 'code'>.," <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41117661/66711902-4212ca00-edb2-11e9-9ddf-669eb0915378.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: I have the same issue on a local machine.
Closing since there have been significant changes to st.cache since this was filed.
